info.description: BW version golfed from "Minimal Jigsaw" by Shane. [url]https://shadertoy.com/view/wddGzj[/url]
info.name: Minimal Jigsaw - BW (222 chars)

renderpass.code:
// BW & golfed from "Minimal Jigsaw" by Shane. https://shadertoy.com/view/wddGzj

          
// 222 chars ( -1 by MMZ, -1 by Fab )  ( -12/16 without animation )

void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U) {
    vec2  u = 8.* U /iResolution.y + iTime/vec2(1,2),
          i = ceil(u),
          m = mod(i,2.) - .5,
          D = dot(m, u -= i-.5) < 0. ? -m : m,
          c = length(u - D*.2) - .2 +u-u,
          f = abs(u - D)*.7; f += f.y -.7;
    O -=  28.*min(c, (fract(length(i*1e2))-.5)*D.x<0. ? max(f,-c) : f).x;
}/*




// 224 chars by Fab  ( -13/17 without animation )

#define mainImage(O,U)                                    \
    vec2  u = 8.* U /iResolution.y + vec2(1,.5)*iTime,    \
          i = ceil(u),                                    \
          m = mod(i,2.) - .5,                             \
          D = dot(m, u -= i-.5) < 0. ? -m : m,            \
          f = abs(u - D)*.7 -.35,                         \
          c = length(u - D*.2) - .2 +u-u;  f+= f.y;       \
    O -=  28.*min(c, (fract(length(i*1e2))-.5)*D.x<0. ? max(f,-c) : f).x /*




// 230 chars by Greg & Fab  ( -21 without animation )

#define mainImage(O,U)                                    \
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,                             \
          u = 8.* U /R.y + vec2(1,.5)*iTime,              \
          i = ceil(u),                                    \
          m = mod(i,2.) - .5,                             \
          D = dot(m, u -= i-.5) < 0. ? -m : m;            \
    float f = dot( abs(u - D), R/R) *.7 -.7,              \
          c = length(u - D*.2) - .2;                      \
    O -=  28.*min(c, (fract(length(i*R))-.5)*D.x<0. ? max(f,-c) : f) /*




// 246 chars by Fab 

#define mainImage(O,U)                                    \
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,                             \
          u = 4.* ( U+U - R ) /R.y + vec2(1,.5)*iTime,    \
          i = ceil(u),                                    \
          m = mod(i,2.) - .5,                             \
          D = dot(m, u -= i-.5) < 0. ? -m : m;            \
    float f = dot( abs(u - D), R/R) *.7 -.67,             \
          c = length(u - D*.2) - .2;                      \
    O += 1.- R.y/8.* min(c, (fract(length(i*R))-.5)*D.x<0. ? max(f,.06-c) : f) /*




// 262 chars by Fab

#define mainImage(O,U)                                    \
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,                             \
          u = 4.*( U+U - R )/R.y + vec2(1,.5)*iTime,      \
          i = ceil(u),                                    \
          m = mod(i,2.) - .5,                             \
          D = dot(m, u -= i-.5) < 0. ? -m : m;            \
    float f = dot( abs(u - D), R/R) *.7 -.67,             \
          c = length(u - D*.2) - .2;                      \
    O += 1.- R.y/8.* min((fract(sin(dot(i,vec2(27, 57)))*1e5)-.5)*D.x<0. ? max(f,.06-c) : f, c) /*

/**/
renderpass.name: Image
